mapper.select: SELECT param_value FROM tb_bellows_config WHERE thing_code = #{thingCode} AND param_name = #{paramName}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_bellows_config set param_value = #{paramValue} WHERE thing_code = #{thingCode} and param_name = #{paramName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_bellows_compressor_log (thing_code, operation, operate_type, operate_time, pre_state, request_id, memo, post_state, confirm_time, pressure) VALUES (#{log.thingCode}, #{log.operation}, #{log.operateType}, #{log.operateTime}, #{log.preState}, #{log.requestId}, #{log.memo}, #{log.postState}, #{log.confirmTime}, #{log.pressure})
INSERT INTO tb_bellows_compressor_state (thing_code, post_state, pre_state, time) VALUES (#{state.thingCode}, #{state.postState}, #{state.preState}, #{state.time})
